text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1986-87 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July ?, 1986 to June 22, 1987), see the links below ==References== ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1986-87
